column4: <meta name="keywords" content="Customs and Excise Department (Money Service Operators Licensing System ) - Money Service Operators Licensing System ">

column3: <meta name="description" content="Money Service Operators Licensing System provided by the Hong Kong Customs and Excise Department.  Contents include Index Page, Online Functions for Money Service Operators (MSOs), Create User Account, User Login, Licensed Money Service Operators, Guidelines, Licensing Issues, Enforcement News , Legislation , Online Demonstration, Create User Account, Form 1 MSO Licence Application, Resubmit Missing Documents, Form 2 Application for Renewal of a Money Service Operator (MSO) Licence, Form 4 Application for Approval in respect of Persons Proposing to become Licensees Partners / Directors / Ultimate Owners, Form 5 Application to add New Premises used for the operation of a Money Service, Submit Periodic Return for Statement of Transaction, Forms, Publications and Notices, Links, FAQs, Contact us, Important Notice, Security Statement for the Money Service Operators Licensing System (MSOS)">
